walker.easydb.dao
Class SqlConstructor

java.lang.Object
  walker.easydb.dao.SqlConstructor

public abstract class SqlConstructor
extends java.lang.Object

This class constructs the INSERT/DELETE/QUERY/UPDATE sql, it supports for multiple database.

Author:
HuQingmiao
